project.name: MetaRAG
project.description: MetaRAG is an open-source Python framework designed for multi-model Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It enables parallel querying of multiple (5+) Large Language Models (LLMs), scoring responses based on similarity with the context, and aggregating top responses for enhanced accuracy and comprehensiveness. With this our aim is to build a india's most trustworhty AI framework for getting most relevant responses and for better understanding.

use_of_funds.description: Support for core developers to implement advanced features such as integration with additional LLMs, enhanced document processing capabilities, and optimization of response aggregation algorithms.
Costs associated with hosting, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and maintaining demo environments to facilitate user onboarding and testing.
Organizing workshops, webinars, and creating comprehensive documentation to foster a vibrant community around MetaRAG.
